<form formGroup="form">
    <mat-form-field class="example-full-width">
        <mat-label>Favorite food</mat-label>
        <input matInput placeholder="Ex. Pizza" value="Sushi">
      </mat-form-field>

        <mat-label>Favorite food</mat-label>
        <input matInput placeholder="Ex. Pizza" value="Sushi">
      </mat-form-field>
 </form>
<button mat-raised-button color="warn" (click)="auth.login()">Login</button>
